recipe.title: Royal Icing

steps.step: Sift together sugar and meringue powder.
Add water. Beat gently together until it forms a paste.
Beat mixture until it mounts and forms firm peaks. Icing should be stiff enough to hold its shape, and soft enough to squeeze through a pastry bag and remain pliable.

recipe.storage: Store tightly covered, as icing dries out rapidly. Re-beat icing that has been stored longer than a few hours. For long-term storage, store in refrigerator or freezer.
